pkgmetadata.longdescription: Test for a Neutral Evolutionary Model in Cancer Sequencing Data // Package takes frequencies of mutations as reported by high throughput sequencing data from cancer and fits a theoretical neutral model of tumour evolution. Package outputs summary statistics and contains code for plotting the data and model fits. See Williams et al 2016 doi:10.1038/ng.3489 and Williams et al 2017 doi:10.1101/096305 for further details of the method.
